ProjectTitle: Dolichol: An overlooked lipid in human health and disease
InitialFeedbackHistory:
07/06/2024
Documentation/Metadata: Please describe here how you will document your data, will you for example use (electronic) notebooks, protocols? Storage is part of the next question. Under sharing you mention using proteomeexchange and ENA, best also to have a look already which metadata they require 
Sharing: RD-connect is no longer updated, maybe EGA is a suitable alternative (https://ega-archive.org/) or have a look at https://www.re3data.org/. Otherwise you can use the KU Leuven depository RDR which is open for data from all disciplines: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
